name: Bulbasaur
desc: Bulbasaur is a dual-type Grass/Poison Pokémon. It has the ability to absorb sunlight and use it for energy. Its strengths include versatility in battles with both grass and poison-type moves. However, it's weak to psychic and fire-type attacks.

name: Ivysaur
desc: Ivysaur is the evolved form of Bulbasaur. It continues to harness the power of the sun through the plant bulb on its back. Its strength lies in its evolving capabilities and varied movepool. It's vulnerable to psychic and fire-type moves.

name: Venusaur
desc: Venusaur is the final evolution of Bulbasaur and Ivysaur. It's a powerful and imposing Pokémon with a giant flower on its back. Its abilities include strong grass and poison-type attacks. However, it's susceptible to psychic and fire-type moves.

name: Charmander
desc: Charmander is a Fire-type Pokémon. It has a burning flame at the tip of its tail, which represents its life force. Its strength lies in its fiery moves, but it's weak against water-type attacks.

name: Charmeleon
desc: Charmeleon is the evolved form of Charmander. It boasts a fiercer flame and enhanced fire-type abilities. However, it's still vulnerable to water-type moves.

name: Charizard
desc: Charizard is the final evolution of Charmander. It becomes a mighty Fire/Flying-type Pokémon with the ability to unleash devastating fire attacks. While it gains flight, it's doubly weak to water and electric-type moves.

name: Squirtle
desc: Squirtle is a Water-type Pokémon. It's known for its water cannons on its back. It excels in water-type moves but is at a disadvantage against grass and electric-type attacks.

name: Wartortle
desc: Wartortle is the evolved form of Squirtle. It gains more control over its water-based abilities, making it a formidable Water-type Pokémon. However, it remains weak to grass and electric-type moves.

name: Blastoise
desc: Blastoise is the final evolution of Squirtle. It's a Water-type powerhouse with immense water cannons. Its strength lies in water-type attacks, but it's vulnerable to grass and electric-type moves.

name: Caterpie
desc: Caterpie is a Bug-type Pokémon known for its resilience and ability to evolve into stronger forms. However, it's weak to fire, flying, and rock-type attacks.

name: Metapod
desc: Metapod is the evolved form of Caterpie. While it gains increased defensive capabilities, it remains weak to fire, flying, and rock-type moves.

name: Butterfree
desc: Butterfree is the final evolution of Caterpie and Metapod. It becomes a graceful Bug/Flying-type Pokémon with the ability to mesmerize opponents. It's strong against grass and fighting-type moves but weak to electric, ice, and rock-type attacks.

name: Weedle
desc: Weedle is a Bug/Poison-type Pokémon. It's known for its sharp stingers and ability to evolve into more formidable forms. However, it's vulnerable to fire and psychic-type moves.

name: Kakuna
desc: Kakuna is the evolved form of Weedle. It gains increased defensive capabilities but remains weak to fire and psychic-type attacks.

name: Beedrill
desc: Beedrill is the final evolution of Weedle and Kakuna. It's a swift and formidable Bug/Poison-type Pokémon. It excels against grass and psychic-type moves but is weak to fire and flying-type attacks.

name: Pidgey
desc: Pidgey is a Normal/Flying-type Pokémon known for its gentle nature and ability to evolve into stronger forms. However, it's weak to electric, ice, and rock-type moves.

name: Pidgeotto
desc: Pidgeotto is the evolved form of Pidgey. It becomes a more powerful Normal/Flying-type Pokémon. It remains weak to electric, ice, and rock-type attacks.

name: Pidgeot
desc: Pidgeot is the final evolution of Pidgey and Pidgeotto. It becomes a majestic Normal/Flying-type Pokémon with powerful wings. It's weak to electric, ice, and rock-type moves.

name: Rattata
desc: Rattata is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its sharp teeth and quick reflexes. It's vulnerable to fighting-type moves.

name: Raticate
desc: Raticate is the evolved form of Rattata. It retains its sharp teeth and agility. It's vulnerable to fighting-type moves.

name: Spearow
desc: Spearow is a Normal/Flying-type Pokémon known for its keen eyesight and speed. It's weak to electric and ice-type attacks.

name: Fearow
desc: Fearow is the evolved form of Spearow. It becomes a swift and powerful Normal/Flying-type Pokémon. It's weak to electric and ice-type moves.

name: Ekans
desc: Ekans is a Poison-type Pokémon known for its coiling and striking abilities. It's weak against psychic and ground-type moves.

name: Arbok
desc: Arbok is the evolved form of Ekans. It becomes a more menacing Poison-type Pokémon with strong intimidation tactics. It's weak against psychic and ground-type attacks.

name: Pikachu
desc: Pikachu is an Electric-type Pokémon known for its cute appearance and electrical powers. It's strong against water and flying-type moves but vulnerable to ground-type attacks.

name: Raichu
desc: Raichu is the evolved form of Pikachu. It retains its electrical prowess and gains enhanced abilities. It's strong against water and flying-type moves but vulnerable to ground-type attacks.

name: Sandshrew
desc: Sandshrew is a Ground-type Pokémon known for its tough hide and digging skills. It's strong against electric and poison-type moves but vulnerable to water and ice-type attacks.

name: Sandslash
desc: Sandslash is the evolved form of Sandshrew. It becomes even tougher and gains more proficient digging abilities. It's strong against electric and poison-type moves but vulnerable to water and ice-type attacks.

name: Nidoran♀
desc: Nidoran♀ is a Poison-type Pokémon with a cautious disposition. It's strong against grass and bug-type moves but vulnerable to ground and psychic-type attacks.

name: Nidorina
desc: Nidorina is the evolved form of Nidoran♀. It becomes more mature and gains stronger poison-type abilities. It's strong against grass and bug-type moves but vulnerable to ground and psychic-type attacks.

name: Nidoqueen
desc: Nidoqueen is the final evolution of Nidoran♀. It's a powerful Poison/Ground-type Pokémon with impressive offensive and defensive capabilities. It's strong against grass and bug-type moves but vulnerable to ground, water, and ice-type attacks.

name: Nidoran♂
desc: Nidoran♂ is a Poison-type Pokémon with a competitive nature. It's strong against grass and bug-type moves but vulnerable to ground and psychic-type attacks.

name: Nidorino
desc: Nidorino is the evolved form of Nidoran♂. It becomes more aggressive and gains stronger poison-type abilities. It's strong against grass and bug-type moves but vulnerable to ground and psychic-type attacks.

name: Nidoking
desc: Nidoking is the final evolution of Nidoran♂. It's a formidable Poison/Ground-type Pokémon with great offensive capabilities. It's strong against grass and bug-type moves but vulnerable to ground, water, and ice-type attacks.

name: Clefairy
desc: Clefairy is a Fairy-type Pokémon known for its cuteness and magical properties. It's strong against dragon-type moves but vulnerable to steel and poison-type attacks.

name: Clefable
desc: Clefable is the evolved form of Clefairy. It becomes even more adept at using its magical powers. It's strong against dragon-type moves but vulnerable to steel and poison-type attacks.

name: Vulpix
desc: Vulpix is a Fire-type Pokémon known for its six orange tails. It's strong against grass, bug, ice, and steel-type moves but vulnerable to water and rock-type attacks.

name: Ninetales
desc: Ninetales is the evolved form of Vulpix. It gains mystical powers and nine elegant tails. It's strong against grass, bug, ice, and steel-type moves but vulnerable to water and rock-type attacks.

name: Jigglypuff
desc: Jigglypuff is a Normal/Fairy-type Pokémon known for its singing ability and round shape. It's strong against dragon-type moves but vulnerable to steel and poison-type attacks.

name: Wigglytuff
desc: Wigglytuff is the evolved form of Jigglypuff. It becomes larger and gains enhanced singing abilities. It's strong against dragon-type moves but vulnerable to steel and poison-type attacks.

name: Zubat
desc: Zubat is a Poison/Flying-type Pokémon known for its ability to navigate in the dark. It's strong against grass, fighting, bug, and fairy-type moves but vulnerable to electric, ice, and rock-type attacks.

name: Golbat
desc: Golbat is the evolved form of Zubat. It gains greater wingspan and remains adept at flying in the dark. It's strong against grass, fighting, bug, and fairy-type moves but vulnerable to electric, ice, and rock-type attacks.

name: Oddish
desc: Oddish is a Grass/Poison-type Pokémon known for its sweet scent and medicinal properties. It's strong against water, electric, and fighting-type moves but vulnerable to fire and ice-type attacks.

name: Gloom
desc: Gloom is the evolved form of Oddish. It retains its sweet scent but becomes more potent. It's strong against water, electric, and fighting-type moves but vulnerable to fire and ice-type attacks.

name: Vileplume
desc: Vileplume is another evolution of Oddish. It gains the power to release toxic pollen. It's strong against water, electric, and fighting-type moves but vulnerable to fire and ice-type attacks.

name: Paras
desc: Paras is a Bug/Grass-type Pokémon known for the mushroom on its back. It's strong against water, electric, ground, and rock-type moves but vulnerable to fire, flying, bug, and ice-type attacks.

name: Parasect
desc: Parasect is the evolved form of Paras. The mushroom on its back takes control. It's strong against water, electric, ground, and rock-type moves but vulnerable to fire, flying, bug, and ice-type attacks.

name: Venonat
desc: Venonat is a Bug/Poison-type Pokémon known for its compound eyes. It's strong against grass, fighting, bug, and fairy-type moves but vulnerable to psychic and flying-type attacks.

name: Venomoth
desc: Venomoth is the evolved form of Venonat. It gains greater control over its psychic powers. It's strong against grass, fighting, bug, and fairy-type moves but vulnerable to psychic and flying-type attacks.

name: Diglett
desc: Diglett is a Ground-type Pokémon known for its burrowing abilities. It's strong against electric and poison-type moves but vulnerable to water, ice, and grass-type attacks.

name: Dugtrio
desc: Dugtrio is the evolved form of Diglett. It gains even more proficiency in digging. It's strong against electric and poison-type moves but vulnerable to water, ice, and grass-type attacks.

name: Meowth
desc: Meowth is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its fondness for shiny objects. It's vulnerable to fighting-type moves.

name: Persian
desc: Persian is the evolved form of Meowth. It becomes sleeker and more elegant. It's vulnerable to fighting-type moves.

name: Psyduck
desc: Psyduck is a Water-type Pokémon known for its perpetual headache. It's strong against fire and rock-type moves but vulnerable to electric and grass-type attacks.

name: Golduck
desc: Golduck is the evolved form of Psyduck. Its psychic powers become more pronounced. It's strong against fire and rock-type moves but vulnerable to electric and grass-type attacks.

name: Mankey
desc: Mankey is a Fighting-type Pokémon known for its short temper and aggressiveness. It's strong against normal, ice, rock, and dark-type moves but vulnerable to flying and psychic-type attacks.

name: Primeape
desc: Primeape is the evolved form of Mankey. Its anger fuels its strength. It's strong against normal, ice, rock, and dark-type moves but vulnerable to flying and psychic-type attacks.

name: Growlithe
desc: Growlithe is a Fire-type Pokémon known for its loyalty and bravery. It's strong against grass, bug, ice, and steel-type moves but vulnerable to water and rock-type attacks.

name: Arcanine
desc: Arcanine is the evolved form of Growlithe. It's a majestic Fire-type Pokémon with legendary abilities. It's strong against grass, bug, ice, and steel-type moves but vulnerable to water and rock-type attacks.

name: Poliwag
desc: Poliwag is a Water-type Pokémon known for its swirling pattern. It's strong against fire, ground, and rock-type moves but vulnerable to electric and grass-type attacks.

name: Poliwhirl
desc: Poliwhirl is the evolved form of Poliwag. It gains greater control over its water-based powers. It's strong against fire, ground, and rock-type moves but vulnerable to electric and grass-type attacks.

name: Poliwrath
desc: Poliwrath is another evolution of Poliwag. It becomes a Water/Fighting-type Pokémon with impressive martial arts skills. It's strong against fire, ground, rock, and dark-type moves but vulnerable to electric, grass, flying, and psychic-type attacks.

name: Abra
desc: Abra is a Psychic-type Pokémon known for its teleportation abilities. It's strong against fighting and poison-type moves but vulnerable to bug and ghost-type attacks.

name: Kadabra
desc: Kadabra is the evolved form of Abra. Its psychic powers become more potent. It's strong against fighting and poison-type moves but vulnerable to bug and ghost-type attacks.

name: Alakazam
desc: Alakazam is the final evolution of Abra and Kadabra. It becomes an extremely powerful Psychic-type Pokémon with unparalleled psychic abilities. It's strong against fighting and poison-type moves but vulnerable to bug and ghost-type attacks.

name: Machop
desc: Machop is a Fighting-type Pokémon known for its immense strength and training regimen. It's strong against normal, ice, rock, and dark-type moves but vulnerable to flying and psychic-type attacks.

name: Machoke
desc: Machoke is the evolved form of Machop. It becomes even stronger and more muscular. It's strong against normal, ice, rock, and dark-type moves but vulnerable to flying and psychic-type attacks.

name: Machamp
desc: Machamp is the final evolution of Machop and Machoke. It's a powerhouse Fighting-type Pokémon with four powerful arms. It's strong against normal, ice, rock, and dark-type moves but vulnerable to flying and psychic-type attacks.

name: Bellsprout
desc: Bellsprout is a Grass/Poison-type Pokémon known for its carnivorous nature. It's strong against water, electric, fighting, and fairy-type moves but vulnerable to fire, flying, psychic, and ice-type attacks.

name: Weepinbell
desc: Weepinbell is the evolved form of Bellsprout. It retains its carnivorous traits and becomes more formidable. It's strong against water, electric, fighting, and fairy-type moves but vulnerable to fire, flying, psychic, and ice-type attacks.

name: Victreebel
desc: Victreebel is another evolution of Bellsprout. It becomes a menacing Grass/Poison-type Pokémon with a giant mouth. It's strong against water, electric, fighting, and fairy-type moves but vulnerable to fire, flying, psychic, and ice-type attacks.

name: Tentacool
desc: Tentacool is a Water/Poison-type Pokémon known for its tentacles and ability to sting opponents. It's strong against fire, ground, and rock-type moves but vulnerable to electric, psychic, and ice-type attacks.

name: Tentacruel
desc: Tentacruel is the evolved form of Tentacool. It becomes a larger and more menacing Water/Poison-type Pokémon. It's strong against fire, ground, and rock-type moves but vulnerable to electric, psychic, and ice-type attacks.

name: Geodude
desc: Geodude is a Rock/Ground-type Pokémon known for its rock-hard exterior. It's strong against fire, electric, poison, and rock-type moves but vulnerable to water, ice, grass, fighting, and ground-type attacks.

name: Graveler
desc: Graveler is the evolved form of Geodude. It becomes larger and more durable. It's strong against fire, electric, poison, and rock-type moves but vulnerable to water, ice, grass, fighting, and ground-type attacks.

name: Golem
desc: Golem is the final evolution of Geodude and Graveler. It becomes an imposing Rock/Ground-type Pokémon with immense strength. It's strong against fire, electric, poison, and rock-type moves but vulnerable to water, ice, grass, fighting, and ground-type attacks.

name: Ponyta
desc: Ponyta is a Fire-type Pokémon known for its fiery mane and swift running. It's strong against grass, bug, ice, and steel-type moves but vulnerable to water and rock-type attacks.

name: Rapidash
desc: Rapidash is the evolved form of Ponyta. It becomes even faster and more majestic. It's strong against grass, bug, ice, and steel-type moves but vulnerable to water and rock-type attacks.

name: Slowpoke
desc: Slowpoke is a Water/Psychic-type Pokémon known for its slow and laid-back nature. It's strong against fire, fighting, water, and psychic-type moves but vulnerable to electric, bug, ghost, and dark-type attacks.

name: Slowbro
desc: Slowbro is the evolved form of Slowpoke. It gains greater psychic powers and a shellder attached to its tail. It's strong against fire, fighting, water, and psychic-type moves but vulnerable to electric, bug, ghost, and dark-type attacks.

name: Magnemite
desc: Magnemite is an Electric/Steel-type Pokémon known for its magnetic properties. It's strong against Electric, Steel, Ice, and Fairy-type moves but vulnerable to Ground and Fighting-type attacks.

name: Magneton
desc: Magneton is the evolved form of Magnemite. It's an Electric/Steel-type Pokémon with enhanced magnetic abilities. It's strong against Electric, Steel, Ice, and Fairy-type moves but vulnerable to Ground and Fighting-type attacks.

name: Farfetch'd
desc: Farfetch'd is a Normal/Flying-type Pokémon known for carrying a leak as a weapon. In its Galarian form, it becomes a Fighting-type Pokémon. It's strong against Fighting, Bug, and Grass-type moves but vulnerable to Electric and Ice-type attacks.

name: Doduo
desc: Doduo is a Normal/Flying-type Pokémon known for its two heads. It's strong against Fighting, Bug, and Grass-type moves but vulnerable to Electric, Ice, and Rock-type attacks.

name: Dodrio
desc: Dodrio is the evolved form of Doduo. It retains its Normal/Flying typing with three heads. It's strong against Fighting, Bug, and Grass-type moves but vulnerable to Electric, Ice, and Rock-type attacks.

name: Seel
desc: Seel is a Water-type Pokémon known for its sleek and aquatic appearance. It's strong against Fire, Ground, and Rock-type moves but vulnerable to Electric and Grass-type attacks.

name: Dewgong
desc: Dewgong is the evolved form of Seel. It gains an Ice-type and remains a Water-type. It's strong against Ice, Water, Grass, and Flying-type moves but vulnerable to Electric, Rock, and Fighting-type attacks.

name: Grimer
desc: Grimer is a Poison-type Pokémon known for its sludge-like appearance. In its Alolan form, it gains the Dark-type. It's strong against Grass, Fairy, Bug, and Fighting-type moves but vulnerable to Ground and Psychic-type attacks.

name: Muk
desc: Muk is the evolved form of Grimer. In its Alolan form, it remains a Poison-type with the added Dark-type. It's strong against Grass, Fairy, Bug, and Fighting-type moves but vulnerable to Ground and Psychic-type attacks.

name: Shellder
desc: Shellder is a Water-type Pokémon known for its shell and clamp-like appearance. It's strong against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Electric and Grass-type attacks.

name: Cloyster
desc: Cloyster is the evolved form of Shellder. It gains the Ice-type and retains the Water-type. It's strong against Ice, Water, Grass, and Ground-type moves but vulnerable to Electric and Fighting-type attacks.

name: Gastly
desc: Gastly is a Ghost/Poison-type Pokémon known for its eerie appearance. It's strong against Poison and Bug-type moves but vulnerable to Dark and Ground-type attacks.

name: Haunter
desc: Haunter is the evolved form of Gastly. It retains the Ghost/Poison typing with a more menacing appearance. It's strong against Poison and Bug-type moves but vulnerable to Dark and Ground-type attacks.

name: Gengar
desc: Gengar is the final evolved form of Gastly. It remains a Ghost/Poison-type with a mischievous and powerful demeanor. It's strong against Poison and Bug-type moves but vulnerable to Dark and Ground-type attacks.

name: Onix
desc: Onix is a Rock/Ground-type Pokémon known for its massive size. It's strong against Normal, Fire, Poison, Flying, Bug, and Electric-type moves but vulnerable to Water, Grass, Ice, and Fighting-type attacks.

name: Drowzee
desc: Drowzee is a Psychic-type Pokémon known for its sleep-inducing abilities . It's strong against Fighting and Poison-type moves but vulnerable to Bug, Ghost, and Dark-type attacks.

name: Hypno
desc: Hypno is the evolved form of Drowzee. It remains a Psychic-type with enhanced psychic abilities. It's strong against Fighting and Poison-type moves but vulnerable to Bug, Ghost, and Dark-type attacks.

name: Krabby
desc: Krabby is a Water-type Pokémon known for its pincer-like claws. It's strong against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Electric and Grass-type attacks.

name: Kingler
desc: Kingler is the evolved form of Krabby. It retains the Water-type with even larger and more powerful pincers. It's strong against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Electric and Grass-type attacks.

name: Voltorb
desc: Voltorb is an Electric-type Pokémon known for its spherical shape. It's strong against Electric and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Ground-type attacks.

name: Electrode
desc: Electrode is the evolved form of Voltorb. It remains an Electric-type with explosive capabilities. It's strong against Electric and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Ground-type attacks.

name: Exeggcute
desc: Exeggcute is a Grass/Psychic-type Pokémon consisting of multiple eggs. It's strong against Water, Electric, Grass, and Fighting-type moves but vulnerable to Ice, Bug, Ghost, Fire, and Dark-type attacks.

name: Exeggutor
desc: Exeggutor is the evolved form of Exeggcute. It remains a Grass/Psychic-type in its standard form and becomes a Grass/Dragon-type in its Alolan form. It's strong against Water, Electric, Grass, and Fighting-type moves but vulnerable to Ice, Bug, Ghost, Fire, and Dark-type attacks.

name: Cubone
desc: Cubone is a Ground-type Pokémon known for wearing the skull of its deceased mother as a helmet. It's strong against Poison, Rock, and Electric-type moves but vulnerable to Water, Grass, and Ice-type attacks.

name: Marowak
desc: Marowak is the evolved form of Cubone. It remains a Ground-type in its standard form and becomes a Fire/Ghost-type in its Alolan form. It's strong against Poison, Rock, and Electric-type moves but vulnerable to Water, Grass, and Ice-type attacks.

name: Hitmonlee
desc: Hitmonlee is a Fighting-type Pokémon known for its incredible kicking abilities. It's strong against Normal, Rock, Steel, Ice, and Dark-type moves but vulnerable to Flying, Psychic, and Fairy-type attacks.

name: Hitmonchan
desc: Hitmonchan is a Fighting-type Pokémon known for its boxing prowess. It's strong against Normal, Rock, Steel, Ice, and Dark-type moves but vulnerable to Flying, Psychic, and Fairy-type attacks.

name: Lickitung
desc: Lickitung is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its long tongue. It's strong against Normal, Rock, and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Fighting-type attacks.

name: Koffing
desc: Koffing is a Poison-type Pokémon known for emitting toxic gases. It's strong against Grass, Fairy, Bug, and Fighting-type moves but vulnerable to Ground and Psychic-type attacks.

name: Weezing
desc: Weezing is the evolved form of Koffing. It remains a Poison-type in its standard form and becomes a Poison/Fairy-type in its Galarian form. It's strong against Grass, Fairy, Bug, and Fighting-type moves but vulnerable to Ground and Psychic-type attacks.

name: Rhyhorn
desc: Rhyhorn is a Ground/Rock-type Pokémon known for its tough hide and horn. It's strong against Normal, Fire, Electric, Poison, Rock, and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Water, Grass, Ice, Fighting, Ground, and Steel-type attacks.

name: Rhydon
desc: Rhydon is the evolved form of Rhyhorn. It retains the Ground/Rock typing with enhanced power. It's strong against Normal, Fire, Electric, Poison, Rock, and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Water, Grass, Ice, Fighting, Ground, and Steel-type attacks.

name: Chansey
desc: Chansey is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its incredible HP stat and healing abilities. It's strong against Normal, Rock, and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Fighting-type attacks.

name: Tangela
desc: Tangela is a Grass-type Pokémon known for its vines. It's strong against Water, Electric, Grass, and Ground-type moves but vulnerable to Fire, Ice, Poison, Flying, and Bug-type attacks.

name: Kangaskhan
desc: Kangaskhan is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its motherly instincts. It's strong against Normal, Rock, and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Fighting-type attacks.

name: Horsea
desc: Horsea is a Water-type Pokémon known for its seahorse-like appearance. It's strong against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Electric and Grass-type attacks.

name: Seadra
desc: Seadra is the evolved form of Horsea. It retains the Water-type with enhanced aquatic abilities. It's strong against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Electric and Grass-type attacks.

name: Goldeen
desc: Goldeen is a Water-type Pokémon known for its horn. It's strong against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Electric and Grass-type attacks.

name: Seaking
desc: Seaking is the evolved form of Goldeen. It retains the Water-type with a more majestic appearance. It's strong against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Electric and Grass-type attacks.

name: Staryu
desc: Staryu is a Water-type Pokémon known for its star-like appearance. It's strong against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Electric and Grass-type attacks.

name: Starmie
desc: Starmie is the evolved form of Staryu. It gains the Psychic-type and retains the Water-type. It's strong against Fire, Water, Ice, Fighting, Poison, Psychic, Steel, and Fairy-type moves but vulnerable to Electric, Grass, Bug, Ghost, and Dark-type attacks.

name: Mr. Mime
desc: Mr. Mime is a Psychic/Fairy-type Pokémon known for its mime-like appearance. In its Galarian form, it becomes an Ice/Psychic-type Pokémon. It's strong against Fighting, Psychic, Ice, and Dragon-type moves but vulnerable to Poison and Steel-type attacks.

name: Scyther
desc: Scyther is a Bug/Flying-type Pokémon known for its speed and scythe-like arms. It's strong against Grass, Fighting, Bug, and Ground-type moves but vulnerable to Rock, Electric, Ice, and Fire-type attacks.

name: Jynx
desc: Jynx is an Ice/Psychic-type Pokémon known for its graceful appearance. It's strong against Ice, Psychic, Flying, Ground, and Dragon-type moves but vulnerable to Fire, Steel, Rock, Dark, and Bug-type attacks.

name: Electabuzz
desc: Electabuzz is an Electric-type Pokémon known for its electric power. It's strong against Electric and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Ground-type attacks.

name: Magmar
desc: Magmar is a Fire-type Pokémon known for its fiery appearance. It's strong against Bug, Steel, Grass, Ice, and Fairy-type moves but vulnerable to Water and Rock-type attacks.

name: Pinsir
desc: Pinsir is a Bug-type Pokémon known for its powerful pincers. It's strong against Grass, Fighting, and Ground-type moves but vulnerable to Flying, Rock, and Fire-type attacks.

name: Tauros
desc: Tauros is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its wild and aggressive nature. It's strong against Normal, Rock, and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Fighting-type attacks.

name: Magikarp
desc: Magikarp is a Water-type Pokémon known for its weak appearance. It evolves into Gyarados, a powerful Water/Flying-type Pokémon.

name: Gyarados
desc: Gyarados is the evolved form of Magikarp. It becomes a Water/Flying-type with tremendous power. It's strong against Fire, Water, Fighting, Bug, and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Electric and Rock-type attacks.

name: Lapras
desc: Lapras is a Water/Ice-type Pokémon known for its elegant appearance. It's strong against Ice, Water, Fighting, Ground, and Grass-type moves but vulnerable to Electric , Rock, and Grass-type attacks.

name: Ditto
desc: Ditto is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its ability to transform into any other Pokémon. It's strong against Normal, Rock, and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Fighting-type attacks.

name: Eevee
desc: Eevee is a unique Normal-type Pokémon known for its multiple evolution options. Depending on certain conditions, it can evolve into various Eeveelutions, each with its own type and abilities.

name: Vaporeon
desc: Vaporeon is one of Eevee's evolutions, known for its Water-type abilities. It's strong against Fire, Water, Ice, and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Electric and Grass-type attacks.

name: Jolteon
desc: Jolteon is one of Eevee's evolutions, known for its Electric-type abilities. It's strong against Electric and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Ground-type attacks.

name: Flareon
desc: Flareon is one of Eevee's evolutions, known for its Fire-type abilities. It's strong against Bug, Steel, Grass, Ice, and Fairy-type moves but vulnerable to Water and Rock-type attacks.

name: Porygon
desc: Porygon is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its artificial, computer-like appearance. It's strong against Normal, Rock, and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Fighting-type attacks.

name: Omanyte
desc: Omanyte is a Rock/Water-type Pokémon known for its ancient origins. It's strong against Normal, Fire, Ice, Poison, and Electric-type moves but vulnerable to Water, Grass, Fighting, Ground, and Steel-type attacks.

name: Omastar
desc: Omastar is the evolved form of Omanyte. It retains the Rock/Water typing with enhanced power. It's strong against Normal, Fire, Ice, Poison, and Electric-type moves but vulnerable to Water, Grass, Fighting, Ground, and Steel-type attacks.

name: Kabuto
desc: Kabuto is a Rock/Water-type Pokémon known for its fossilized appearance. It's strong against Normal, Fire, Ice, Poison, and Electric-type moves but vulnerable to Water, Grass, Fighting, Ground, and Steel-type attacks.

name: Kabutops
desc: Kabutops is the evolved form of Kabuto. It retains the Rock/Water typing with enhanced power. It's strong against Normal, Fire, Ice, Poison, and Electric-type moves but vulnerable to Water, Grass, Fighting, Ground, and Steel-type attacks.

name: Aerodactyl
desc: Aerodactyl is a Rock/Flying-type Pokémon known for its prehistoric origins. It's strong against Normal, Fire, Ice, Bug, and Flying-type moves but vulnerable to Water, Electric, Ice, and Rock-type attacks.

name: Snorlax
desc: Snorlax is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its immense size and love for sleep. It's strong against Normal, Rock, and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Fighting-type attacks.

name: Articuno
desc: Articuno is an Ice/Flying-type Legendary Pokémon known for its icy powers. It's strong against Grass, Fighting, Bug, and Ground-type moves but vulnerable to Electric, Rock, Steel, and Fire-type attacks.

name: Zapdos
desc: Zapdos is an Electric/Flying-type Legendary Pokémon known for its electric abilities. It's strong against Electric, Flying, and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Ice and Rock-type attacks.

name: Moltres
desc: Moltres is a Fire/Flying-type Legendary Pokémon known for its fiery powers. It's strong against Bug, Grass, Fighting, and Steel-type moves but vulnerable to Water, Electric, and Rock-type attacks.

name: Dratini
desc: Dratini is a Dragon-type Pokémon known for its serpentine appearance. It's strong against Electric and Grass-type moves but vulnerable to Ice and Dragon-type attacks.

name: Dragonair
desc: Dragonair is the evolved form of Dratini. It retains the Dragon-type with enhanced elegance. It's strong against Electric and Grass-type moves but vulnerable to Ice and Dragon-type attacks.

name: Dragonite
desc: Dragonite is the final evolved form of Dratini. It becomes a Dragon/Flying-type with incredible power. It's strong against Electric, Grass, Fighting, Bug, and Ground-type moves but vulnerable to Ice and Rock-type attacks.

name: Mewtwo
desc: Mewtwo is a Psychic-type Legendary Pokémon known for its immense psychic abilities. It's strong against Fighting and Poison-type moves but vulnerable to Bug, Ghost, and Dark-type attacks.

name: Mew
desc: Mew is a Psychic-type Mythical Pokémon known for its genetic versatility. It's strong against Fighting and Poison-type moves but vulnerable to Bug, Ghost, and Dark-type attacks.

name: Mew
desc: Mew is a Psychic-type Pokémon known for its ability to learn any move. It is said to contain the genetic code of all Pokémon.

name: Chikorita
desc: Chikorita is a Grass-type Pokémon known for its leafy collar. It is the first stage of the Johto Grass Starter.

name: Bayleef
desc: Bayleef is a Grass-type Pokémon known for the large leaves on its neck. It is the evolved form of Chikorita.

name: Meganium
desc: Meganium is a Grass-type Pokémon and the final evolution of Chikorita. It has a gentle and soothing demeanor.

name: Cyndaquil
desc: Cyndaquil is a Fire-type Pokémon known for its fiery back. It is the first stage of the Johto Fire Starter.

name: Quilava
desc: Quilava is a Fire-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Cyndaquil. It has a fiery personality.

name: Typhlosion
desc: Typhlosion is a Fire-type Pokémon and the final evolution of Cyndaquil. It has a fiery mane and is incredibly powerful.

name: Totodile
desc: Totodile is a Water-type Pokémon known for its powerful jaws. It is the first stage of the Johto Water Starter.

name: Croconaw
desc: Croconaw is a Water-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Totodile. It has strong aquatic abilities.

name: Feraligatr
desc: Feraligatr is a Water-type Pokémon and the final evolution of Totodile. It is known for its immense strength.

name: Sentret
desc: Sentret is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its keen sense of smell. It can stand on its tail to get a better view.

name: Furret
desc: Furret is a Normal-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Sentret. It is known for its long, slender body.

name: Hoothoot
desc: Hoothoot is a Normal/Flying-type Pokémon known for its ability to rotate its head 180 degrees. It is a vigilant night owl.

name: Noctowl
desc: Noctowl is a Normal/Flying-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Hoothoot. It is said to bring good fortune.

name: Ledyba
desc: Ledyba is a Bug/Flying-type Pokémon known for its gentle nature. It has a pattern of five spots on its back.

name: Ledian
desc: Ledian is a Bug/Flying-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Ledyba. It is known for its graceful aerial maneuvers.

name: Spinarak
desc: Spinarak is a Bug/Poison-type Pokémon known for spinning webs to catch prey. It has a distinctive zigzag pattern on its back.

name: Ariados
desc: Ariados is a Bug/Poison-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Spinarak. It is skilled at using its silk to trap foes.

name: Crobat
desc: Crobat is a Poison/Flying-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Golbat. It is known for its incredible speed and agility.

name: Chinchou
desc: Chinchou is a Water/Electric-type Pokémon known for its ability to produce bright flashes of light. It lives in the ocean depths.

name: Lanturn
desc: Lanturn is a Water/Electric-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Chinchou. It uses its light to attract prey in the deep ocean.

name: Pichu
desc: Pichu is an Electric-type Baby Pokémon known for its small size and playful nature. It can release sparks of electricity.

name: Cleffa
desc: Cleffa is a Fairy-type Baby Pokémon known for its cuteness. It is said to bring happiness to those who see it.

name: Igglybuff
desc: Igglybuff is a Normal/Fairy-type Baby Pokémon. It loves to sing and can make its opponents drowsy with its voice.

name: Togepi
desc: Togepi is a Fairy-type Baby Pokémon known for its egg-shaped appearance. It is said to bring joy and happiness to trainers.

name: Togetic
desc: Togetic is a Fairy/Flying-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Togepi. It spreads happiness and positive energy.

name: Natu
desc: Natu is a Psychic/Flying-type Pokémon known for its ability to foresee the future. It is said to bring good fortune.

name: Xatu
desc: Xatu is a Psychic/Flying-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Natu. It stands still to observe the sun's movement.

name: Mareep
desc: Mareep is an Electric-type Pokémon known for its fluffy wool. It stores electricity in its body and can give static shocks.

name: Flaaffy
desc: Flaaffy is an Electric-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Mareep. Its wool stores a large amount of static electricity.

name: Ampharos
desc: Ampharos is an Electric-type Pokémon known for its impressive Mega Evolution. In its Mega form, it gains the Dragon typing.

name: Bellossom
desc: Bellossom is a Grass-type Pokémon known for its vibrant and colorful appearance. It is the evolved form of Gloom.

name: Marill
desc: Marill is a Water/Fairy-type Pokémon and the pre-evolved form of Azumarill. It is known for its cheerful disposition.

name: Azumarill
desc: Azumarill is a Water/Fairy-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Marill. Its Aqua Jet move is famous for its speed.

name: Sudowoodo
desc: Sudowoodo is a Rock-type Pokémon that disguises itself as a tree. It's known for its stubborn and unyielding nature.

name: Politoed
desc: Politoed is a Water-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Poliwhirl. It is known for its ability to summon rain.

name: Hoppip
desc: Hoppip is a Grass/Flying-type Pokémon and the pre-evolved form of Skiploom. It's known for its floating abilities.

name: Skiploom
desc: Skiploom is a Grass/Flying-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Hoppip. It rides wind currents to get around.

name: Jumpluff
desc: Jumpluff is a Grass/Flying-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Skiploom. It can spread its cotton seeds in the wind.

name: Aipom
desc: Aipom is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its long tail. It uses its tail to swing from tree branches.

name: Sunkern
desc: Sunkern is a Grass-type Pokémon known for its small size. It relies on sunlight to grow and become strong.

name: Sunflora
desc: Sunflora is a Grass-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Sunkern. It is known for its sunny and cheerful appearance.

name: Yanma
desc: Yanma is a Bug/Flying-type Pokémon known for its speed and agility in the air. It has large, multifaceted eyes.

name: Wooper
desc: Wooper is a Water/Ground-type Pokémon known for its ability to live both in water and on land. Its Paldean form adds Poison typing.

name: Quagsire
desc: Quagsire is a Water/Ground-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Wooper. It is known for its easygoing and carefree nature.

name: Espeon
desc: Espeon is a Psychic-type Pokémon and one of Eevee's evolved forms. It is known for its mystical and elegant appearance.

name: Umbreon
desc: Umbreon is a Dark-type Pokémon and one of Eevee's evolved forms. It is known for its mysterious and nocturnal nature.

name: Murkrow
desc: Murkrow is a Dark/Flying-type Pokémon known for its connection to superstitions. It is often associated with ill omens.

name: Slowking
desc: Slowking is a Water/Psychic-type Pokémon known for its intelligence. The Galar form adds Poison typing to this royal Pokémon.

name: Misdreavus
desc: Misdreavus is a Ghost-type Pokémon known for its eerie and mischievous behavior. It often plays pranks on people.

name: Unown
desc: Unown is a Psychic-type Pokémon with 28 different forms, each representing a letter of the alphabet and an exclamation point.

name: Wobbuffet
desc: Wobbuffet is a Psychic-type Pokémon known for its bizarre counterattacking abilities. It has a playful and cheerful nature.

name: Girafarig
desc: Girafarig is a Normal/Psychic-type Pokémon known for its unique appearance with a second head on its tail.

name: Pineco
desc: Pineco is a Bug-type Pokémon that resembles a pinecone. It can explode as a defensive mechanism when threatened.

name: Forretress
desc: Forretress is a Bug/Steel-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Pineco. It has a tough outer shell that protects it.

name: Dunsparce
desc: Dunsparce is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its unique appearance with a drill-like tail. It burrows into the ground.

name: Gligar
desc: Gligar is a Ground/Flying-type Pokémon known for its ability to glide gracefully through the air. It evolves into Gliscor.

name: Steelix
desc: Steelix is a Steel/Ground-type Pokémon known for its incredible defensive capabilities. Its Mega form enhances its power further.

name: Snubbull
desc: Snubbull is a Fairy-type Pokémon known for its tough and bulldog-like appearance. It can be quite playful despite its looks.

name: Granbull
desc: Granbull is a Fairy-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Snubbull. Despite its intimidating looks, it has a gentle nature.

name: Qwilfish
desc: Qwilfish is a Water/Poison-type Pokémon known for its spiky body. It can inflate itself and shoot out toxic spikes.

name: Scizor
desc: Scizor is a Bug/Steel-type Pokémon known for its speed and powerful pincers. Its Mega form enhances its offensive capabilities.

name: Shuckle
desc: Shuckle is a Bug/Rock-type Pokémon known for its incredibly high defense. It can produce Berry juices.

name: Heracross
desc: Heracross is a Bug/Fighting-type Pokémon known for its strength and determination. Its Mega form enhances its power further.

name: Sneasel
desc: Sneasel is a Dark/Ice-type Pokémon known for its speed and sharp claws. It is often associated with thievery.

name: Teddiursa
desc: Teddiursa is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its teddy bear-like appearance. It is quite playful and friendly.

name: Ursaring
desc: Ursaring is a Normal-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Teddiursa. It can be very aggressive when provoked.

name: Slugma
desc: Slugma is a Fire-type Pokémon made of molten magma. It moves slowly but can generate intense heat.

name: Magcargo
desc: Magcargo is a Fire/Rock-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Slugma. Its body temperature is extremely high.

name: Swinub
desc: Swinub is an Ice/Ground-type Pokémon known for its love of cold climates. It often digs through snow in search of food.

name: Piloswine
desc: Piloswine is an Ice/Ground-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Swinub. It has powerful tusks and loves icy terrain.

name: Corsola
desc: Corsola is a Water/Rock-type Pokémon known for its coral-like appearance. It is often found in warm, tropical seas.

name: Remoraid
desc: Remoraid is a Water-type Pokémon resembling a fish. It can shoot water with great accuracy.

name: Octillery
desc: Octillery is a Water-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Remoraid. It has powerful suction cups and can shoot ink.

name: Delibird
desc: Delibird is an Ice/Flying-type Pokémon known for delivering gifts. It carries a sack of presents wherever it goes.

name: Mantine
desc: Mantine is a Water/Flying-type Pokémon resembling a manta ray. It is known for its graceful swimming.

name: Skarmory
desc: Skarmory is a Steel/Flying-type Pokémon known for its sharp, metallic wings. It is a skilled flier and defender.

name: Houndour
desc: Houndour is a Dark/Fire-type Pokémon known for its devilish appearance. It has a strong sense of smell.

name: Houndoom
desc: Houndoom is a Dark/Fire-type Pokémon known for its fiery breath. Its Mega form enhances its power further.

name: Kingdra
desc: Kingdra is a Water/Dragon-type Pokémon known for its regal appearance. It can create powerful whirlpools.

name: Phanpy
desc: Phanpy is a Ground-type Pokémon known for its cute appearance and powerful trunk. It loves to bathe in mud.

name: Donphan
desc: Donphan is a Ground-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Phanpy. It is known for its powerful rolling attacks.

name: Porygon2
desc: Porygon2 is a Normal-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Porygon. It is known for its artificial intelligence.

name: Stantler
desc: Stantler is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its majestic antlers. It can produce strange psychic powers.

name: Smeargle
desc: Smeargle is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its artistic abilities. It can learn and mimic the moves of other Pokémon.

name: Tyrogue
desc: Tyrogue is a Fighting-type Pokémon known for its desire to become stronger. Its evolution depends on its training.

name: Hitmontop
desc: Hitmontop is a Fighting-type Pokémon and one of Tyrogue's evolutions. It spins like a top in battle.

name: Smoochum
desc: Smoochum is an Ice/Psychic-type Pokémon known for its graceful movements. It evolves into Jynx.

name: Elekid
desc: Elekid is an Electric-type Pokémon known for its energetic nature. It evolves into Electabuzz.

name: Magby
desc: Magby is a Fire-type Pokémon known for its fiery spirit. It evolves into Magmar.

name: Miltank
desc: Miltank is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its milk-producing abilities. It is often found on farms.

name: Blissey
desc: Blissey is a Normal-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Chansey. It is known for its incredible healing abilities.

name: Raikou
desc: Raikou is an Electric-type Legendary Pokémon known for its speed and thunderous abilities. It is one of the Legendary Beasts.

name: Entei
desc: Entei is a Fire-type Legendary Pokémon known for its fiery nature and affiliation with fire. It is one of the Legendary Beasts.

name: Suicune
desc: Suicune is a Water-type Legendary Pokémon known for its grace and association with water. It is one of the Legendary Beasts.

name: Larvitar
desc: Larvitar is a Rock/Ground-type Pokémon known for its tough skin. It evolves into Pupitar.

name: Pupitar
desc: Pupitar is a Rock/Ground-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Larvitar. It is encased in a durable shell.

name: Tyranitar
desc: Tyranitar is a Rock/Dark-type Pokémon known for its incredible power and destructive nature. Its Mega form enhances its strength.

name: Lugia
desc: Lugia is a Psychic/Flying-type Legendary Pokémon known for its calm demeanor and control over the seas. It is a guardian of the ocean.

name: Ho-Oh
desc: Ho-Oh is a Fire/Flying-type Legendary Pokémon known for its colorful appearance and affiliation with rainbows. It is a symbol of hope.

name: Celebi
desc: Celebi is a Psychic/Grass-type Mythical Pokémon known for its ability to travel through time and protect forests.

name: Treecko
desc: Treecko is a Grass-type Pokémon known for its agility and climbing abilities. It is the first stage of its evolutionary line.

name: Grovyle
desc: Grovyle is a Grass-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Treecko. It is known for its leafy tail and speed.

name: Sceptile
desc: Sceptile is a Grass-type Pokémon and the final evolution of Treecko. Its Mega form adds Dragon typing to its Grass type.

name: Torchic
desc: Torchic is a Fire-type Pokémon known for its cheerful disposition. It is the first stage of its evolutionary line.

name: Combusken
desc: Combusken is a Fire/Fighting-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Torchic. It has strong kicking abilities.

name: Blaziken
desc: Blaziken is a Fire/Fighting-type Pokémon and the final evolution of Torchic. Its Mega form enhances its combat abilities.

name: Mudkip
desc: Mudkip is a Water-type Pokémon known for its love of water and mud. It is the first stage of its evolutionary line.

name: Marshtomp
desc: Marshtomp is a Water/Ground-type Pokémon and the evolved form of Mudkip. It has powerful flippers for swimming.
